import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function App() { const courses=[ {id: "MarcheF",nom:"Marche femmes",categorie:"F", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarcheH",nom:"Marche hommes",categorie:"H", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarathonF",nom:"Marathon fommes",categorie:"F", distance:42000 }, {id: "MarathonH",nom:"Marathon hommes",categorie:"H", distance:42000 } ] ; const participants=[ {id: "1", nom:"Med", idCourse: "MarcheH"}, {id: "2",nom:"Rajae", idCourse: "MarcheF"} ]; const [list,setList]=useState(participants) return (
